timeline.bodyText: has a static method and constructor

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/HideUtilityClassConstructorCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/HideUtilityClassConstructorCheck.java index aa234e3c7..875d1a321 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/HideUtilityClassConstructorCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/HideUtilityClassConstructorCheck.java @@ -61,7 +61,7 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.TokenTypes; * Example: *

* 
- * class Test { // violation, class only has a static method
+ * class Test { // violation, class only has a static method and a constructor
  *
  *   public Test() {
  *   }

timeline.bodyText: Please change name, class name should start from uppercase
